sentence.Network_en: He was just another faceless bureaucrat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他只不过是一个典型呆板的官员.

sentence.Network_en: He is a conservative bureaucrat who can be counted upon to follow a beaten path.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个保守的官僚,他准会循规蹈矩地办事.

sentence.Network_en: I suppose my application has been lost by some incompetent bureaucrat.
sentence.Network_cn: 我估计我的申请书不知道让哪个无能的官僚给弄丢了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... （bureau 政府机构+ ) bureaucrat n 官僚 （pluto 财富+.
新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... anatomy n. 构造；解剖学 bureaucrat n. 官僚主义者 cartoon n. 漫画，讽刺画.
西拉雅语 - 维基百科，自由的百科全书 ... contract 契约,书籍 bureaucrat 官吏(老爹) Qianlong 乾隆(清朝).
老字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 老鸦〖 crow〗 老爷〖 bigwig;bureaucrat;master〗 老爷爷〖 grandpa〗.

list.abs: 我国学校组织的基本架构为科层体制（bureaucratic system ），科层体制具有权威阶层、法规条例、专职分工、不讲人倩、书面案卷 …
官僚控制（Bureaucratic Control）氏族控制（Clan Control） 研究活动 [编辑] 在更大的社区，大内供职于美国总统辩论委员会的咨询 …
行政管理专... ... bureaucratic model 官僚模式 bureaucratic organization 官僚组织 Bureaucratic sabotage 官僚怠工/官僚破坏.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French bureaucrate, from bureaucratie (see bureaucracy)

entry.def: Bureaucrats are officials who work in a large administrative system. You can refer to officials as bureaucrats especially if you disapprove of them because they seem to follow rules and procedures too strictly.

example.ex: The economy is still controlled by bureaucrats.
example.tran: 经济依然被官僚们所掌控。
